column1: Travel Queries Forecast Template - Enhanced with ARIMA Model and Improved Brand Metrics
1. This template is designed to forecast travel queries for a market using the multi-factor approach and ARIMA model
2. Fill in the data in each of the input sheets (Historical Queries
3. Adjust the parameters in the Parameters sheet if needed
4. The forecast will automatically calculate based on the input data and parameters

column5: Aligned with Armenia model (5%, 10%, 15%) but adjusted downward for UK market maturity
Reduced from Armenia model (0.10, 0.15, 0.20) to account for UK market maturity
Significantly reduced from Armenia model (0.05, 0.10, 0.15) to temper the impact of high flight search growth
Reduced from Armenia model (0.15, 0.20, 0.25) due to already high brand health metrics in UK

column3: The ARIMA model order (p,d,q) where p=1 (autoregressive), d=1 (differencing), q=1 (moving average)
Outliers are detected using Z-scores with a threshold of 3.0 standard deviations
Outliers are adjusted using the median of surrounding values with a window size of 3
The confidence level used for the prediction intervals
Weight given to Intent in the Brand Health Multiplier formula
Weight given to Consideration in the Brand Health Multiplier formula
Baseline Intent/Consideration ratio for the market (Q4 2024)
Factor applied to the difference between market conversion ratio and baseline
